3. Ethics and legal: are there any restrictions using and sharing IEA and IRENA data, do you have a DTA or are these datasets available under a licence?   
5. Storage: Dropbox is not very secure, you can consider using KU Leuven onedrive instead: https://admin.kuleuven.be/icts/services/onedrive
7. Sharing: Have you considered using a repository for data sharing? If there are no suitable domain specific repositories in your field you can use KU Leuven RDR (www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr)
